divs: Sighting DetailsI was at work and snuck out the back for a quick butt, the area is on the second floor area that is less then 30i feet from the rivers edge, as i am looking around at the sky (which i tend to do often) i see nothing...then i look up at the bridge (which is about 8the storys high and no more than 100 yards from where i stood) i notice that. The street lights were much brighter. As i stare i notice them start to sway much like a balllon would with the calmness of a kite flying on windy day. I then realize what i am seeing. 4 Redish orbs hovering above the bridge blending in with the exact color of the street lights! They almost looked like they had candles lit inside of them that gave them a firey color to it. They hovered and i swayed for roughly 40 more seconds staying in the same spot, i then reach for my phone to take a picture....and as soon as the flash of it went off the zoomed so faast into the sky into the hevans. And beyond the stars. I managed to get a picture of them. When i went back inside to work, i was speachless aand couldnt think or even remeber how i got to work, this i is one of my three incidences. I am 22
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around January 16th 2011
Summary: red orbs which i thought were street lights at first
